## About VerChem
VerChem is a free, world-class chemistry platform providing powerful calculators, interactive tools, and comprehensive chemical data for students, educators, and professionals.

## Key Features

### Chemistry Calculators (8 Tools)
1. Equation Balancer - Balance chemical equations automatically
2. Stoichiometry Calculator - Mass, mole, limiting reagent, percent yield calculations
3. Solutions & pH Calculator - Molarity, dilution, pH, pOH, buffer solutions
4. Gas Laws Calculator - Ideal gas, combined gas, Van der Waals, Graham's law
5. Thermodynamics Calculator - Enthalpy, entropy, Gibbs free energy
6. Chemical Kinetics - Rate laws, half-life, Arrhenius equation
7. Electrochemistry - Redox reactions, galvanic cells, Nernst equation
8. Electron Configuration - Orbital diagrams, noble gas notation

### Interactive Tools (5 Tools)
1. Interactive Periodic Table - All 118 elements with NIST/IUPAC data
2. 3D Molecular Viewer - Visualize molecular structures
3. Lewis Structure Generator - Electron dot diagrams
4. VSEPR Geometry Predictor - Molecular shapes and geometry
5. Virtual Lab - Titration simulator

### AI-Powered Features
1. AI Chemistry Tutor - 24/7 personalized tutoring (Claude-powered)
2. AI Problem Generator - Unlimited practice problems with step-by-step solutions
